name: Dr. Dog's Human Society
description:
The year: 202X. After the Robot Uprising and the Petpocalypse, stray humans are often found running about with nobody to look after them.

You are Dr. Dog, a border collie with a great pedigree and a medical pet-degree. You have just opened your own Human Society, the first no-kill shelter for humans. Choose, feed, and entertain your humans, keep them healthy, and maybe even find them their forever homes!

What we got done: Right now you can just walk around the shelter a little bit, and none of the simulation bits really work. There are a few cool things to look at though! Some of the humans are also randomly generated, so try reloading a couple times. The HUD in the upper right corner is just a preview of how some of the in-game UI might look, with your funds, population, happiness, health, and hunger stats.

If we had more time: The game would let you manage your shelter and who was admitted. You'd need to pay rent and upkeep, and make tradeoffs such as which food and entertainment to give to which humans. How much can you expand your shelter? How many humans can you find forever homes for? If this concept sounds cool, let us know in the comments!

Controls:

Move: Left/Right/Up/Down 

Exit Elevator: Esc/Space (A/B on controller)
